info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 5:13PM EDT until May 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 513 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Orwell, or 17 miles east of Chardon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Orwell, Andover, Pymatuning Central, Pymatuning North, Roaming Shores and Cherry Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
